text: The 2015 Four Nations Tournament was the fourteenth edition of the Four Nations Tournament, an invitational women's football tournament held in China. The tournament was won by Canada. ==Participants== {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align: left;" |- ! Team ! title: 2015 Four Nations Tournament (women's football)
